Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps

Class Criteria<T>

java.lang.Object
ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<T>
Type Parameters:
T - is a type of a value to be checked/filtered
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<Predicate<T>>
public final class Criteria<T> extends Object implements Supplier<Predicate<T>>
This class is designed to create a Predicate used by SequentialGetStepSupplier
